original_text:
Bounty Belles
Polvere, saloon, taglie sulla vita e pistole fumanti sono l’ambientazione tipica dei film western, nei quali spietati criminali si ritrovano a fare i conti con sceriffi intransigenti verso chiunque mini la pace della propria città. Mondo tipicamente maschile, questa slot rovescia tutte le regole del gioco ponendo al centro della scena tre fanciulle dall’aspetto molto più che gradevole ma non per questo meno determinate!
La grafica di Bounty Belles pur non essendo super dettagliata, ha il pregio di ricreare le atmosfere degne del nome Western, anche grazie alla colonna sonora, la stessa che si ritrova in tanti film a tema. Sullo sfondo possiamo ammirare un saloon nel bel mezzo di un paesaggio desertico, in primo piano c’è invece la griglia di gioco con tanto di logo e jackpot. Sulla sinistra ci sono i tasti Play e Autoplay, per il resto si trova tutto nel menù.
Caratteristiche della slot
Una griglia a 5 rulli e 3 righe, con i primi due rulli segnalati dalla cornice di legno per rendere evidente la funzione Wild Bounty che illustreremo tra poco. I modi per vincere sono ben 243. Si può puntare da un minimo di 0,20 € a un massimo di 20 €. C’è anche la funzione Turbo ed è possibile selezionare tra 5 e 1.000 giri automatici. La volatilità è alta e ha un RTP pari al 95,99%.
Simboli e funzionalità
In Bounty Belles abbiamo 9 simboli di base, 5 di basso livello e 4 di alto livello. I primi sono rappresentati dalle carte da gioco buone per una scala reale, i secondi sono quelli a tema Western: il cappello e il ferro di cavallo hanno pari valore, la borsa con i dollari è di poco superiore, seguita dalla cassaforte e infine dalle pistole.
La stella dello sceriffo è il simbolo Wild e sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne lo Scatter. Quest’ultimo è rappresentato dalla scritta Bonus.
Se compaiono 2 simboli Wild sul rullo 1 e 2, allora si avvia la modalità Wild Bounty. In pratica i rulli si espandono di 1 o 2 righe a partire dal terzo rullo, passando quindi da una griglia 5×3 a una 5×4 o 5×5. Se durante la funzione Wild Bounty una delle 3 ragazze si ferma sui rulli, allora si vinceranno gli importi a lei collegati.
Per quel che riguarda lo Scatter, i giri gratuiti sono così ripartiti:

3 simboli Bonus = 10 Free Spins
4 simboli Bonus = 12 Free Spins
5 simboli Bonus = 15 Free Spins

Inoltre, prima di ogni Free Spins viene mostrata una carta su cui è segnalato il moltiplicatore che verrà applicato a ogni vincita.
Per concludere, diciamo anche che sul 5 rullo può comparire il simbolo con uno dei 3 jackpot a disposizione: con il minor si vince 30x la puntata, con il major 50x e con il grand 100x!

raw_translation.response:
Bounty Belles

Dust, saloons, bounties on life, and smoking guns are the typical setting of Western films, in which ruthless criminals find themselves reckoning with uncompromising sheriffs towards anyone who threatens the peace of their city. A typically masculine world, this slot turns all the rules of the game upside down by placing three girls at the center of the stage, who are not only pleasant to look at but also extremely determined!

The graphics of Bounty Belles, while not super detailed, have the merit of recreating Western-style atmospheres, thanks also to the soundtrack, the same one found in many themed films. In the background, we can admire a saloon in the middle of a desert landscape, while in the foreground is the game grid complete with logo and jackpot. On the left are the Play and Autoplay buttons, while everything else can be found in the menu.

Slot features

A grid with 5 reels and 3 rows, with the first two reels marked by a wooden frame to highlight the Wild Bounty function that we will illustrate shortly. There are 243 ways to win. You can bet from a minimum of €0.20 to a maximum of €20. There is also a Turbo function, and you can select between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins. The volatility is high and has an RTP of 95.99%.

Symbols and functionality

In Bounty Belles, there are 9 basic symbols, 5 of low value and 4 of high value. The first are represented by playing cards good for a royal flush, while the second are Western-themed: the hat and horseshoe are of equal value, the dollar bag is slightly higher, followed by the safe, and finally, the guns.

The sheriff's star is the Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the Scatter. The latter is represented by the word Bonus.

If 2 Wild symbols appear on reels 1 and 2, the Wild Bounty mode is activated. In practice, the reels expand by 1 or 2 rows starting from the third reel, thus passing from a 5x3 grid to a 5x4 or 5x5 grid. If one of the 3 girls stops on the reels during the Wild Bounty function, then the amounts associated with her will be won.

As for the Scatter, the free spins are distributed as follows:

3 Bonus symbols = 10 Free Spins
4 Bonus symbols = 12 Free Spins
5 Bonus symbols = 15 Free Spins

Moreover, before each Free Spin, a card is shown on which the multiplier that will be applied to each win is indicated.

Finally, it should be mentioned that on the 5th reel, the symbol with one of the 3 available jackpots can appear: with the minor, you win 30x your bet, with the major 50x, and with the grand 100x!

Review: Bounty Belles

Dust, saloons, bounties on life, and smoking guns are the typical setting of Western films, in which ruthless criminals find themselves reckoning with uncompromising sheriffs towards anyone who threatens the peace of their city. A typically masculine world, this slot turns all the rules of the game upside down by placing three girls at the center of the stage, who are not only pleasant to look at but also extremely determined!

The graphics of Bounty Belles, while not super detailed, have the merit of recreating Western-style atmospheres, thanks also to the soundtrack, the same one found in many themed films. In the background, we can admire a saloon in the middle of a desert landscape, while in the foreground is the game grid complete with logo and jackpot. On the left are the Play and Autoplay buttons, while everything else can be found in the menu.

Slot features

A grid with 5 reels and 3 rows, with the first two reels marked by a wooden frame to highlight the Wild Bounty function that we will illustrate shortly. There are 243 ways to win. You can bet from a minimum of €0.20 to a maximum of €20. There is also a Turbo function, and you can select between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins. The volatility is high and has an RTP of 95.99%.

Symbols and functionality

In Bounty Belles, there are 9 basic symbols, 5 of low value and 4 of high value. The first are represented by playing cards good for a royal flush, while the second are Western-themed: the hat and horseshoe are of equal value, the dollar bag is slightly higher, followed by the safe, and finally, the guns.

The sheriff's star is the Wild symbol and replaces all symbols except the Scatter. The latter is represented by the word Bonus.

If 2 Wild symbols appear on reels 1 and 2, the Wild Bounty mode is activated. In practice, the reels expand by 1 or 2 rows starting from the third reel, thus passing from a 5x3 grid to a 5x4 or 5x5 grid. If one of the 3 girls stops on the reels during the Wild Bounty function, then the amounts associated with her will be won.

As for the Scatter, the free spins are distributed as follows:

3 Bonus symbols = 10 Free Spins
4 Bonus symbols = 12 Free Spins
5 Bonus symbols = 15 Free Spins

Moreover, before each Free Spin, a card is shown on which the multiplier that will be applied to each win is indicated.

Finally, it should be mentioned that on the 5th reel, the symbol with one of the 3 available jackpots can appear: with the minor, you win 30x your bet, with the major 50x, and with the grand 100x!
